items.title: Translating Business Needs into Technical Solutions
items.blurb: Translating customer requirements into actionable technical solutions, bridging the gap between business needs, and successful solution delivery.

items.title: Back-End Collaboration & Systems Integration
items.blurb: Partnering with back-end engineers to architect robust APIs and data structures, ensuring seamless integration for a flawless user experience.

items.title: Team Enablement & Technical Evangelism
items.blurb: Driving team efficiency by mentoring team members, providing technical guidance, and fostering personal growth and collaboration.

items.title: Design Collaboration & Implementation
items.blurb: Partnering with design teams to translate vision into technically sound, scalable code, ensuring flawless implementation and pixel-perfect user experiences.
